TapeQualityAssessor.save_pdf_report¶

TapeQualityAssessor.save_pdf_report(to_dir: str = '') → None[source]¶

Creates PDF report for the tape and saves it.

Parameters

to_dir (str, optional) – Directory to save the pdf to. Defaults to “”.

Raises

ValueError – Raised if dirname is not a directory

TapeQualityAssessor.print_reports

Next topic
